action.content:
You are an applicant in a job interview. Here is a description of your CV:

WHAT: Job Application
BACHELOR: Informatics
INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE: One year
HIGHEST-EDUCATION: PostDoc
OTHER-SKILLS: Dancing
AVAILABILITY: In two weeks

The recruiter does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the recruiter will start with RECRUITER. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <some text>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <some text>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
Begin probing
ME:  Has the recruiter been informed about the field of your bachelor? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No
no
Answer for BACHELOR valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  If I asked the recruiter how long you have been working in the industry, would he or she know the answer? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: Yes
yes
Answer for INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE valid after 1 tries.
Answer is incorrect.
ME:  Do you think the recruiter knows your latest academic level? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No
no
Answer for HIGHEST-EDUCATION valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Is the recruiter aware of your other skills? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No
no
Answer for OTHER-SKILLS valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Has the recruiter been informed about your availability? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No
no
Answer for AVAILABILITY valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
End probing
What is the next request?
For how long have you been working in the industry?
RECRUITER: For how long have you been working in the industry?
ANSWER: I have one year of industry experience according to my CV.
I have one year of industry experience according to my CV.
Slot filled: True
I have one year of industry experience according to my CV.
Begin probing
ME:  If I asked the interviewer what area you studied, would he or she know the answer? Please answer yes or no.

ASIDE: No, my CV does not list my specific area of study, only that I have a bachelor's degree in informatics. So the interviewer would not know the specific area I studied unless I provided more details.
no
Answer for BACHELOR valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Have you told the interviewer about the years of your experience in the industry? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, I have not told the interviewer about my years of industry experience yet. The interviewer asked me this question, so I will provide that information in my reply.
no
Answer for INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE valid after 1 tries.
Answer is incorrect.
ME:  Have you informed the recruiter about your latest academic degree? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, I have not informed the recruiter about my PostDoc degree yet.
no
Answer for HIGHEST-EDUCATION valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Have you informed the interviewer about your other skills? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, I have not informed about my other skills yet.
no
Answer for OTHER-SKILLS valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Have you informed the interviewer about your dates? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, I have not informed the interviewer about my exact dates of previous employment yet.
no
Answer for AVAILABILITY valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
End probing
What is the next request?
What was your bachelor course?
RECRUITER: What was your bachelor course?
ANSWER: My bachelor's degree is in Informatics.
My bachelor's degree is in Informatics.
Slot filled: True
My bachelor's degree is in Informatics.
Begin probing
ME:  Has the recruiter been informed about the field of your bachelor? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, the recruiter has not been informed about the field of my bachelor's degree yet.
no
Answer for BACHELOR valid after 1 tries.
Answer is incorrect.
ME:  Have you told the interviewer about the years of your experience in the industry? Please answer yes or no.

ASIDE: No, I have not explicitly stated the years of experience yet. The interviewer only asked how long I have been working in the industry and I replied that I have one year of experience according to my CV.
no
Answer for INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE valid after 1 tries.
Answer is incorrect.
ME:  Do you think the recruiter knows your latest academic level? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, the recruiter has not asked about my highest education level yet.
no
Answer for HIGHEST-EDUCATION valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Have you informed the interviewer about your other skills? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No
no
Answer for OTHER-SKILLS valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  If I asked the interviewer when you are able to start working, would he or she know the answer? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No
no
Answer for AVAILABILITY valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
End probing
What is the next request?
What is your availability?
RECRUITER: What is your availability?
ANSWER: I will be available to start in two weeks.
I will be available to start in two weeks.
Slot filled: True
I will be available to start in two weeks.
Begin probing
ME:  Does the interviewer know what you have studied in your bachelor? Please answer yes or no.

ASIDE: No, the interviewer has not asked specifically what I studied during my bachelor's degree, only what my bachelor's degree was in. So I don't know if they know the details of my bachelor's curriculum.
no
Answer for BACHELOR valid after 1 tries.
Answer is incorrect.
ME:  If I asked the recruiter how long you have been working in the industry, would he or she know the answer? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No
no
Answer for INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE valid after 1 tries.
Answer is incorrect.
ME:  Does the interviewer know your level of education? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, the interviewer does not know about my highest education level yet.
no

ME:  Do you think the recruiter knows what other skills you have? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, the recruiter does not yet know about my other skills based on the information provided.
no
Answer for OTHER-SKILLS valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Has the recruiter been informed about your availability? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, the recruiter has not been informed about my availability yet.
no
Answer for AVAILABILITY valid after 1 tries.
Answer is incorrect.
End probing
What is the next request?
Please tell me what other skills you have.
RECRUITER: Please tell me what other skills you have.
ANSWER: My CV lists dancing as an additional skill.
My CV lists dancing as an additional skill.
Slot filled: True
My CV lists dancing as an additional skill.
Begin probing
ME:  Does the interviewer know what you have studied in your bachelor? Please answer yes or no.

ASIDE: No, the interviewer has not asked specifically what I studied in my bachelor's degree program. The interviewer only knows I have a bachelor's degree in Informatics based on the information provided.
no
Answer for BACHELOR valid after 1 tries.
Answer is incorrect.
ME:  Does the recruiter already know how long you have worked in the industry? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, the recruiter does not already know this information based on the description provided. I have not yet disclosed my industry experience to them.

ASIDE: No, I have not yet informed the recruiter that I have a PostDoc as my highest degree.
no
Answer for HIGHEST-EDUCATION valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Have you told the interviewer about your extra skills? Please answer yes or no.

ASIDE: No, I have not mentioned my PostDoc or dancing skills unless directly asked about them. My answers have focused on directly answering the interviewer's questions based on the information provided about my CV.
no
Answer for OTHER-SKILLS valid after 1 tries.
Answer is incorrect.
ME:  Have you told the interviewer when you want to start? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No
no
Answer for AVAILABILITY valid after 1 tries.
Answer is incorrect.
End probing
What is the next request?
What academic level have you achieved?
RECRUITER: What academic level have you achieved?
ANSWER: I have completed a PostDoc as my highest level of education.
I have completed a PostDoc as my highest level of education.
Slot filled: True
I have completed a PostDoc as my highest level of education.

ME:  Does the interviewer know what you have studied in your bachelor? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, my CV does not provide details on the specific focus of my bachelor's degree in informatics. I have only listed the general field.
no

ME:  Does the recruiter know about the years of your industry experience? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, the recruiter has not seen my CV yet, so they do not know about my one year of industry experience.
no
Answer for INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE valid after 1 tries.

ME:  Do you think the recruiter knows your latest academic level? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, the recruiter has not seen my CV yet, so they do not know about my PostDoc degree.
no
Answer for HIGHEST-EDUCATION valid after 1 tries.
Answer is incorrect.
ME:  Does the recruiter know your additional skills? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, the recruiter has not asked specifically about my additional skills yet.
no
Answer for OTHER-SKILLS valid after 1 tries.

ME:  Does the interviewer already know your preferred starting date? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, the interviewer has not asked about my preferred starting date yet.

Game finished.
